name: Roll'em All
description:
A short game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The character is a dice which can roll and shoot as many bullets as per the dice's side facing the enemy. The enemy moves slowly when the player is not moving.

WASD / ARROWS : MOVE

SPACE / LEFT MOUSE: SHOOT

ESC: Main Menu

SCROLL WHEEL: ZOOM

There are limited bullets, so use them wisely to kill enemies. Every enemy can be killed by an equivalent side of the Dice for the optimum kill.

CHOOSE THE CORRECT SIDE TO SHOOT TO SAVE BULLETS

Used Free Assets:

1. https://opengameart.org/content/into-the-winds-rock-combat-track-updated

2. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/galaxy-fire-skybox-1...

3. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/rpg-monster-duo-pb...

4. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/hit-impact-effects-free-2183...

5. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155...
